official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish a National Law Enforcement Heroes Memorial within the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to establish within the District of Columbia a National Law Enforcement Heroes Memorial.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish a National Law Enforcement Heroes Memorial within the District of Columbia.
